metadata.title: RHSA-2023:2378: postgresql-jdbc security update (Moderate)
metadata.description:
PostgreSQL is an advanced object-relational database management system. The postgresql-jdbc package includes the .jar files needed for Java programs to access a PostgreSQL database.

Security Fix(es):

* postgresql-jdbc: Information leak of prepared statement data due to insecure temporary file permissions (CVE-2022-41946)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

Additional Changes:

For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9.2 Release Notes linked from the References section.

bugzilla.text: Information leak of prepared statement data due to insecure temporary file permissions

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 is installed
postgresql-jdbc is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
